section.title: Ужываньне
section.para: Акно сцэнароў дазваляе загрузіць існы сцэнар у тэкставую вобласьць і выканаць яго для бягучага праекта. To customize the scripting feature, do the following:

listitem.para: Load a script into the editor by clicking its name in the list in the left-hand panel.
Right-click a button from <1> to <12> in the bottom panel and select Add Script.

When you left-click the number, the selected script will run. You can also start the selected macros from the main menu by using their entries in the Tools menu or by pressing Ctrl+Alt+F# (# 1 to 12).

section.para: By default, scripts are stored in the scripts folder located in the OmegaT installation folder (the folder that contains the OmegaT.jar file).
If you add new scripts there, they will appear in the list of available scripts in the Scripting window.
Некалькі дадатковых сцэнароў можна знайсьці тут: OmegaT Scripts

section.title: Мовы сцэнароў
section.para:
Groovy (http://groovy.codehaus.org): a dynamic language for the Java Virtual machine. Ён аб’ядноўвае моц Java і зручныя функцыі, падобныя мовам тыпу Python, Ruby і Smalltalk.
JavaScript (sometimes abbreviated JS, not to be confused with Java): a prototype-based scripting language that is dynamic, weakly typed and has first-class functions. Гэта — шматпарадыгмавая мова, якая падтрымлівае аб’ектна-арыентаваны, імпэратыўны і функцыянальны стылі праграмаваньня. Being the language behind popular software such as Firefox, it is a familiar and preferred programming tool in the open-source domain.
